properties.entry: SELECT SPACE_NO FROM TB_SPACE WHERE SPACE_NAME = ?
INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW ( RV_NO , BOOK_NO , SPACE_NO , MEM_NO , RV_CONTENT , RV_STAR ) VALUES ( SEQ_RVNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_CATEGORY , FILE_ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_CHANGE_NAME , FILE_UPLOAD_DATE , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_FINO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_RVNO.CURRVAL , 2 , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )
